extension.description:
Content - Extranews plugin: Tin cũ, tin mới và tin liên quan - Phiên bản Joomla! 2.5

The guidance/document can be found at Learn more at the Content - Extranews plugin: Older, Newer and Related Articles project website.

Content - Extranews plugin: Older, Newer and Related Articles is released under the GNU/GPL v2 license.

field.name: n_linkedtitleformat
field.label: Linked title format with date
field.description:
Format of linked title format with date, where %1$s is date and %2$s is linked title. You can use these formats:
+%1$s - %2$s
+%2$s %1$s and Created date display is '(d/m/Y H:i)'
